price: Isaaniifi niitiiwwan isaaniis gaaddisoowwaa keessatti, sireewwan irratti hirkatoodha.
arabic: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hum wa-azwājuhum fī ẓilālin ʿalā al-arāiki muttakiūna
